title: Bring back urf pls :'3
body:
Such a shame that a fun game mode was available for only a short period of time. As well as new players starting league of legends never had the chance to experience urf.  With new champs being released after urf, it would be amazing and a real treat for us RIOT if we could see those champions being played with 90% cdr. 

...pls i really want to see azir with 10 soldiers.

replies.body: Maybe if URF was brought back for just like 1 day each week, instead of it being permanent or not being brought back at all...
leave it as a custom game mode at least
all for 1 was crap imo especially when they put it on howling abyss, only decent game modes have been urf doom bots and ascension

I haven't cared for bringing back URF all that much, but you make a compelling argument. New champs means new things to try out. Also, Rek'Sai tunneling all over the place :D

I do wanna do All For One again.
The last 10 Soraka game I had on that was fun, but how about with New Soraka? It'd be crazy. 
But then again... 10 Rek'Sais! You want to use a tunnel? %%%% you, its not your tunnel, its someone else's.

> [{quoted}](name=Slim Chaedi,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=9FUaBjhv,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-24T09:48:28.359+0000)
>
> But then again... 10 Rek'Sais! You want to use a tunnel? %%%% you, its not your tunnel, its someone else's.

Actually it may be entirely possible for two Rek'Sais on the same team to use each others tunnels. Jarvin had a similar interaction with his Demacian Standard where team mates were able to Dragon Strike to each others Demacian Standards. We just wont know until they bring back URF, which will happen at one point.
We will finally get too see 2 reksai head butt in the same tunnel
As broken as it was it was the most fun I have had in league
Also Azir cdr passive in urf op {{champion:39}}

> [{quoted}](name=Espada XII,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=9FUaBjhv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-24T07:21:30.114+0000)
>
> omg yus pleasee..

WHo gives a ..... about nemesis just bring URF BACK! NO ONE CARES ABOUT YOU JUST MAKING OFFICIAL COPPIES OF WHAT WE ALREADY DO!
URF IS soooo much fun and not what we can do our selves. Listen to your followers or you will lose them RIOT
